main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes the EU's index of tender opportunities, extracts details, and updates the database with new calls.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Provides a real-time monitoring dashboard for system status, scraping statistics, and tender results with pagination and responsive design.

technical_stack.name: Middleware
technical_stack.details: Custom middlewares for handling JavaScript-based applications and retry logic with exponential backoff

priority_order: Web Scraping Engine (highest priority as it populates the database)
Dashboard (second highest, provides real-time monitoring of scraping and data updates)

ImportError.description: The 'Task' model was not imported correctly in 'app/crud.py'.
ImportError.solution: Ensure that the correct import statement for 'Task' is included at the top of 'app/crud.py', e.g., from app.models import Task.
